person.persName: Lucien B. Goggin (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Anna Jane Curtis Goggin on April 25, 1830. Father of Mary L. Goggin, George C. Goggin, Lucy M. O. G. Goggin, Sarah F. Goggin, Robert C. Goggin, Susan E. Goggin, and Emily V. Goggin. Farmer in Mason County in 1850 and 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1853 to 1855. Owned six enslaved persons in 1850 and eight in 1860.
